channel.title: About Us on InLab - Inference Laboratory
channel.description: Recent content in About Us on InLab - Inference Laboratory

item.title: Sub 2022 Conference CoFI Workshop Wednesday 30 November 2022
item.description: Scope of the Workshop The purpose of the workshop is to provide a hands on introduction to CoFI, illustrated through interactive problem solving.

item.title: IAMG 2022 Poster Presentation
item.description: Date: 29 Aug - 3 Sept, 2022 Venue: Nancy, France

item.title: CoFI
item.description: The development of CoFI is now being supported through an AuScope 2021 Pilot Project.

item.title: Tearing down barriers...
item.description: Using polynomial regression as an example we explore how CoFI allows us to swap between fundamentally different inference and optimisation approaches without the need to redefine the problem.

item.title: 2020 Gutenberg Lecture
item.description: The American Geophysical Union has awarded the 2020 Gutenberg Lecture to Prof.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Contact us! Send us an email or use the contact form and we will be in touch
